resource_uuid.description: UUID of the resource this entity is going to be referenced to via :appears_in relationship

slug.description: Unique textual identifier of the entity. Must not contain spaces.

type.description: Type of the entity. E.g. 'person', 'location'. List is configurable. This field becomes a label

name.description: Human readable name of the entity

name_search.description: Used by full text search. Usually a lowercase name

description.description: Entity description. Most likely not used

ned_model.description: Name of the NER/NED model used to extract this entity

ned_id.description: ID of the entity in the context of the used NER/NED model

nationality.description: Nationality if the entity is a person

links.description: Various links related to the entity

links_viaf.description: VIAF link on https://viaf.org/. Should be deprecated and moved into 'links'

links_wiki.description: Wikipedia link. Should be deprecated and moved into 'links'

first_name.description: First name of a person if 'type' is 'person'

last_name.description: Last name of a person if 'type' is 'person'

lat.description: Latitude of the location of the entity if 'type' is 'location'

lng.description: Longitude of the location of the entity if 'type' is 'location'

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 code of the country of the entity if 'type' is 'location'

geoname_id.description: Geoname ID of the entity if 'type' is 'location'. https://www.geonames.org/

geoname_fcl.description: Geoname facility code of the entity if 'type' is 'location'. https://www.geonames.org/

geoname_country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 code of the country of the entity if 'type' is 'location'

geocoding_id.description: Google geocoding ID of the entity if 'type' is 'location'

geocoding_fcl.description: Google geocoding facility code of the entity if 'type' is 'location'

geocoding_country.description: Google geocoding ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 code of the country of the entity if 'type' is 'location'

exec_time.description: Resource creation/modification UNIX time in milliseconds

frequency.description: How many times entity appears in resource

languages.description: ISO 639-1 codes of languages entity appears in the linked resource

services.description: Names of services used to extract this entity from resource

username.description: Username of the user who created this entity
